thread.title: Mike K
thread.title_full: Town Fair Tire Centers, Inc reviewed by Mike K

author: Mike K
title: Mike K
text: Excellent service. Eric showed me four different tire brands, explained the tire patterns on each and which ones were best for north east driving. Based on his knowledge of the products he actually saved me $30.00 a tire on what I originally went in to buy. Very professional and knowledgeable. I recommend tire fair to anyone who needs new tires.
